title: CVS $40 Billion Bond Sale, Trump’s Concerns Over China Deals, Fed Chair ‘Airpocket’
itunes:title: CVS $40 Billion Bond Sale, Trump’s Concerns Over China Deals, Fed Chair ‘Airpocket’
description:
Molly Smith, Bloomberg News Corporate Finance Reporter, discusses  CVS Health kicking off the third-largest corporate bond sale on record to fund its acquisition of Aetna. David McLaughlin, Bloomberg News DOJ Reporter, explains why National Security concerns have scuttled a string of takeovers, including Broadcom’s bid for Qualcomm. Phil Orlando, Chief Equity Strategist at Federated Investors, talks about how the change at Fed impacts the markets. Eric Newcomer, Bloomberg News Startup Reporter, breaks down how Uber spends investor's money.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
